name: Endless Worlds 2D
description:
So we all know this certain open world sandbox game, what if I made a flat clone of it and put in a complete plugin api?

This is Endless Worlds 2D - a chunk-based open world sandbox 2d game, that is written in Java and uses the BlockScript API, a self-written plugin api to create your own blocks, items, and world generators (more soon).

A full documentary (of both game and BlockScript API) is comming soon.
